title: Ghost in the Flames
description: Caina is now a Ghost nightfighter, with the cunning of an elite spy and the skill of a master assassin.But this time, it might take more than that to keep her alive.Caina has been sent to hunt a murderous pyromancer, a master of fiery sorcery, and she soon discovers that more is at stake than just a few murders.Because if she doesn't find the pyromancer soon, the entire world might burn.Starting with her...
author: Jonathan Moeller
